text: mattu phir‌aun‌na balagadallidda hagu tanna nambikeyannu guptavagittidda visvasiyobbanu helidanu; ‘‘nivenu, allahane nannodeyanendu helida matrakke, nim'medeyana kadeyinda spasta nidarsanagalannu tandiruva vyaktiyobbanannu kondu biduvira? Ondu vele avanu sullugaranagiddare, avana sullina honeyu avana meleye iruvudu. Innu, avanu satyavantanagiddare, avanu nimage vagdana madiruva sikseya ondastu bhagavantu nimage khandita sigalide. Allahanu atikramiyagiruva sullugaranige khandita saridariyannu torisuvudilla’’
